conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model presents a clean isometric cutaway of the 2D architectural plan with visible wall thickness and height.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong dimensional transformation with distinct wall/floor planes and clear corners; minimal perspective distortion.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout fidelity is high; room counts and proximities (Kitchen/Living/Alfresco) are accurate. Garage door details are simplified.

interior_elements.notes: Excellent placement of kitchen island, bathroom fixtures, and bedroom layouts matching the original plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; materials are used consistently to define spaces (wood for living, tile for wet areas).

detected_errors.description: Portico and Verandah details slightly simplified compared to the complex line work of the blueprint.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains high geometric integrity and accurate interior furnishing placement.
